description: This file defines the root React component for a chat application, including state management, API interactions, and layout structure with imported subcomponents.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Root React component that manages chat state, handles message sending, and renders layout with child components.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Asynchronous function to send user message to backend API, update messages state, and handle loading/error states.

methods.name: handleNewChat
methods.description: Resets the chat to initial state with a greeting message.
